Moves.Name: Pyro Ball
Moves.Description: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Moves.Name: Gunk Shot
Moves.Description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

Moves.Name: Sucker Punch
Moves.Description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the foe is not readying an attack, however.

Moves.Name: U-turn
Moves.Description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Moves.Name: Bulk Up
Moves.Description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

Moves.Name: Leaf Blade
Moves.Description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

Moves.Name: Triple Arrows
Moves.Description: The user kicks, then fires three arrows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also lower the target’s Defense stat or make it flinch.

Moves.Name: Roost
Moves.Description: The user lands and rests its body. This move restores the user's HP by up to half its max HP.

Moves.Name: Dragon Dance
Moves.Description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

Moves.Name: Earthquake
Moves.Description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

Moves.Name: Swords Dance
Moves.Description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply boosts the user's Attack stat.

Moves.Name: Protect
Moves.Description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Moves.Name: Baton Pass
Moves.Description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

Moves.Name: Poison Jab
Moves.Description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, an arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

Moves.Name: Play Rough
Moves.Description: The user attacks by playing rough with the target. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

Moves.Name: Close Combat
Moves.Description: The user fights the target up close, inflicting damage without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Moves.Name: Horn Leech
Moves.Description: The user drains the target's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

Moves.Name: Zen Headbutt
Moves.Description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target.
